page.title: 08SCHOOL
page.content: School starts at 9a.m. with an assembly for all the children and staff. There are two classes, the infants and the juniors. The infants are aged between 4 and 7 and the juniors are aged between 7 and 11. After assembly we go back to our own classes and start work. At 10.30a.m. we have a playtime which we usually spend outside, and then we come back in to carry on with our work until lunchtime, at 12.00.We eat our sandwiches in the hall, and then we have a playtime until 1.00p.m., although some of us have clubs such as recorders at this time. At 1.00p.m. we carry on with our work which is different depending on the day or time, or on what we are doing, such as the Domesday Project. We have another playtime at 2.15p.m. until 2.30p.m. and we go home at 3.30p.m.
